github_body:
Map changes:
* #292 Fixed cooperative route sharing synchronization of pulls. Fixed left sidebar in map view not being able to be collapsed. Fixed pull top text not showing when viewing a route. Added a 'Loading' message when Pulls are still loading, rather than a 'No pulls created yet' message.
discord_body:
v3.0.1 (2020/05/22)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.1)
Map changes:
    * #292 Fixed cooperative route sharing synchronization of pulls. Fixed left sidebar in map view not being able to be collapsed. Fixed pull top text not showing when viewing a route. Added a 'Loading' message when Pulls are still loading, rather than a 'No pulls created yet' message.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.1](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.1)

Map changes:
* [\#292](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/292) Fixed cooperative route sharing synchronization of pulls. Fixed left sidebar in map view not being able to be collapsed. Fixed pull top text not showing when viewing a route. Added a 'Loading' message when Pulls are still loading, rather than a 'No pulls created yet' message.

changes.change: Fixed cooperative route sharing synchronization of pulls. Fixed left sidebar in map view not being able to be collapsed. Fixed pull top text not showing when viewing a route. Added a 'Loading' message when Pulls are still loading, rather than a 'No pulls created yet' message.
